#summary StupidModel Demo project.

= Introduction =
This tutorial is based on the article _StupidModel and Extensions: A template and teaching tool for agent-based modeling platforms_ by Steven F. Railsback, Steven L. Lytinen and Stephen K. Jackson.

I am sure the !StupidModel considered a relevant learning /comparison tool for agent-based modelling.
